E

eliminatePlayer(Player, String) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.controller.GameController
Removes a Player who was eliminated from the Game: removes his Workers and his God's active modifier (if present), then notifies him of his loss.
eliminatePlayer(GameView, String) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.view.gui.GameBoardController
Handles the elimination of a Player in a 3-players Game, removing his Workers from the Board and showing an opaque panel on his nickname.

errorMessage(String) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.view.gui.LoginController
Allows displaying an error message: when the inserted server IP address is not valid; when the inserted nickname is not valid.
errorMessage(String) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.view.gui.NewGameController
Allows displaying an error message when the inserted Game name is not valid, because: it's longer than 12 characters; it's already taken.
